sense.def:
A streak
je podolgovato znamenje na nečem.

seg.quote: The table was smeared with streaks of paint.
Her hair had a grey streak in it.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
streaked with a colour
, ima na sebi črte določene barve.

cit.quote: biti progast, biti preprežen; s progami

seg.quote: His moustache was streaked with grey.
The sun is streaking the sea with long lines of gold.

sense.def:
To have a particular streak
pomeni imeti določeno značajsko lastnost.

seg.quote: Children have a streak of cruelty.

sense.def:
To streak somewhere
pomeni zelo hitro se nekam premakniti.
